folder.label: Select Folder
folder.no_ts: the folder {} is not a valid SEPAL time series folder. please select a valid Time series folder

out_dir.label: Output directory
out_dir.hint: The output foder will be created automatically based on the basename of your time series. You can still modify it.
out_dir.no_dir: No name have been provided for the output directory

harmonic.label: Number of Harmonics
harmonic.no_poly: no harmonic degree have been provided

freq.label: frequency of seasonal model (month)
freq.no_freq: No frequency for seasonal model have been provided

level.label: Significance level of the monitoring
level.no_level: No significance level have been provided

backend.label: Backend
backend.hint: If you want to use the GPU backend please change your instance setting for a GPU one and restart this application

monitoring.label: Monitoring dates:
monitoring.no_dates: No range of monitoring have been provided
monitoring.bad_order: The provided date does not respect the chronological order: start of history period -> start of monitoring period -> end of monitoring period

history.label: History start date:
history.no_date: No start date of history period have been provided
history.too_short: The history period has less than 40 images

display.title: Result map
display.no_bfast: you need to compute BFAST first
